snippet.title: Achaea - an Animated Introduction
snippet.description:
This is an animated introduction to one of the world's most expansive, deepest multiplayer roleplaying games - Achaea.com.

 Come play as one of a dozen races including troll, dwarf, insectoid Horkval, Rajamala (tigermen), Satyr, and more. Join one of the exceptionally rich and detailed classes, from the Chaos-loving Occultists to the disciplined Blademaster or Monk to one of the honorable Knight classes to Druids, Mages, Shamans, Serpentlords, Alchemists, and much more.

Where will your journey lead you? There are infinite possibilities -- and it all starts here...

Welcome to Achaea -- a game-world for the discerning roleplayer, for the warrior, the merchant, the explorer, the ruler, and yes, the PvPer -- a universe for people who want a tighter community, in a world run by the players themselves. 

Anything is possible in Achaea - and because our community places value on roleplaying, if you can convincingly talk the talk, you get to walk the walk. The world around you can be shaped by you with enough will and determination. Rise to rule one of our influential city-states, become the high priest of one of the games' living Gods. Make your mark -- your actions can define a legacy whose influence will be felt by the entire game far into the future.

Oh, and don't think because we're text-based that it's all kumbaya. Achaea features one of the most intense combat systems of any game, anywhere. Be as bad as you want -- start wars, stab backs... be the wolf amongst the sheep.

We've been called the deepest game on earth. With content to rival the best games available and unique abilities to interact with that content, you can literally do anything you dream in Achaea. 

The sky's the limit -- and it all starts here. How will you leave your mark in Achaea? There's only one way to find out.
